title: Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Formal
title_original: Women's Maxi Tube Dress with Scarf, Drop Waist High Slit Formal Prom, Wedding Guest Cocktail Party Gown

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #113,919 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #565 in Women's Formal Dresses #1,749 in Women's Casual Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Casual

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress!
items.body: The most beautiful dress! Ordered this dress for my bridal shower as a back up and I loved it so much I’m going to be wearing it for my rehearsal. The material is amazing so soft and it fits like a glove. Read more
items.author: nicole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Give it a try!
items.body: The material is a little heavy, but it felt better that way! The color was beautiful, and it was comfortable to wear all evening. I got 0-2, and it wasn’t fitted to my body, but it was flowy. Overall, the dress does have great stretch. For the price and look, it’s a gorgeous dress. Definitely give it a try! Read more
items.author: Spencer Roxas

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wish I had a flat belly
items.body: Dress was adorable but too snug for me in the belly. If I had a very flat belly I would have kept it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress. Heavy because of the skirt but very comfortable and love the flowy skirt and scarf
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress can be for a higher end event or you can dress it down to go on that night out and dressing up a bit. The scarf comes with it and can be styled a few ways because it is very long. The dress is stretchy but is heavy bc of the white skirt part. It definitely isn't like 60 pounds but it has some weight to it. It's still very comfortable and I actually love wearing it. The quality is there but not like really high end quality. Still it's a beautiful dress. It isn't a forgiving dress though. It will show your stomach and hip area so if you have some extra "love" or you have insecurities in that area, I recommend wearing something underneath to suck that all in. I love the style of the dress and it flows when I walk. There is a rubber piece all the way around to help hold the strapless top/dress up. I didn't have much issue with it sliding down but I have a larger chest. I'm 5'7" and weigh roughly 120-125 and wearing a medium. It fits great. If you are pregnant, you could probably wear this dress because it gives that stretch in the stomach. I wouldn't try if you're heavily pregnant but definitely would look cute on about 2-6 months. Read more
items.author: Motheroftwins

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Wouldn’t even wear this for halloween
items.author: Shay piper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegance with a unique touch.
items.body: This dress combines simplicity and sophistication. The fabric drapes beautifully without clinging too much, and the seams and pleats at the waist are well finished, giving it a relaxed yet elegant look. I like that it includes a non slip band, and at the bottom, there is no seam, which makes it flow nicely and also allows for easy adjustment if you want a different length. The side slit is high, adding movement and making it look modern and attractive without losing its tasteful appeal. The dark brown color is elegant and flattering, an uncommon choice for party dresses but easy to pair with gold accessories. The included scarf is a nice extra, as it can be worn in different ways depending on the occasion, draped over the shoulders or as an accessory to change the style of the outfit. In summary, this is a perfect dress for formal events, allowing you to stand out gracefully without overdoing it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and comfortable - more casual than I was expecting
items.body: This dress is ok. It has taken me awhile to figure out what I want to say because I can’t decide if I love it or hate it. It’s a little bit more of a “jersey” material than I was expecting so it looks more casual than formal in my opinion. The neck scarf does dress it up quite a bit so that helps if you’re going for a fancier look. It’s very stretchy and soft so it’s comfortable to wear but it definitely “shows” every nook and cranny of the body. It isn’t see through at all and the color is very pure. It has little plastic tabs on the top to keep it from falling down which is oddly helpful. Overall I’m just not sure if the fit and fabric type are what I was looking for (for a wedding) but it’s still a pretty dress. Read more
items.author: KH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and Versatile Formal Dress
items.body: This maxi dress has a sleek, elegant look that works beautifully for proms, weddings, and cocktail parties. The fabric is lightweight with a soft drape, allowing the dress to flow nicely while still being comfortable to wear. The drop waist adds a flattering shape, and the high slit gives it a touch of modern style without being overdone. The included scarf is a nice addition, offering multiple styling options whether draped over the shoulders, tied, or left flowing for extra drama. The overall design feels refined, making it suitable for both formal and semi-formal occasions. Overall, this gown balances elegance, comfort, and versatility. It’s a stylish choice for special events where a polished and graceful appearance is desired. Read more
items.author: Mohamed

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Mint Green, Red, Navy, Wine Red, White, Yellow, Black and White, Black, Coffee Brown. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
